<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Passing-HubDB-Multi-selection-select-options-into-Module-Field/td-p/386034>

I know it is likely not possible, but a way for developers to populate a choice field with HubDB select column options would be sick. Putting that out there for anyone listening. :slightly_smiling_face:
